name: Linda
greetingText:
To a my favourite stranger, I have only
the best wishes for you on your birthday.
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1:
I want you to know that I don’t have 
a single regret of our time together. 
You helped shape me to be who 
I am today and for that, I’ll always 
be grateful to you :D
textInChatBox: I wish you the best in life always, and your birthday is no exception. May you get everything you’ve ever wished for in life.
text2: When I think about us, I try not to get sad. I think about all the good times we shared together that touched my heart. I’ll remember our memories forever and always. You made such a difference to my life and for that, you’ll forever leave a lasting impact on my heart
text3:
I’ll always be grateful to know you
in my life, as it’s better to have loved
and lost than never to have loved at all.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
